 1998-05781998-04-020HERITAGE,  TB,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAuthorization for the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION to issue a ground lease to the UNIVERSITY OF OTTAWA, for a term of 15 years, with respect to the lands and premises situated on the south side of Laurier Ave. East, between Nicholas and Waller, in Ottawa, together with an option to purchase.
